1.0.2.en: Appstore compatibility changes. Minor translation updates. Updated P1 icon.

1.0.3.en: Sessy and P1 firmware information and flow card added. Homey forced control mode extended to every control attempt. Readme updated.

1.0.4.en: Sessy Dongle and Battery firmware information, flow cards and timeline added. New available firmware now only triggers once after app start.

1.0.5.en: Sessy Dongle and Battery firmware information, flow cards and timeline added. New available firmware now only triggers once after app start.

1.0.6.en: Added settings for minimum and maximum Sessy power. Auto stop charging/discharging when battery is full/empty. Max discharge limit set to 1.8kW.

1.0.7.en: Added frequency info. Added full/empty detection based on system state.

1.0.8.en: Added seperate settings for max charge/discharge limits.
